\begin{problem}
Consider the figure ``Derivation of arrival curve for the output
of a flow
  served in a node with rate-latency service curve $\beta_{R,T}$".
What can be said if $t_{0}$ in the Figure is infinite, namely, if
$a'(t) > r$ for all $t$ ?
\end{problem}
